sn35.125:0.3: In the Land of the Vajjis
sn35.125:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying in the land of the Vajjis at the village of Hatthi.
sn35.125:1.2: Then the householder Ugga of Hatthi went up to the Buddha, sat down to one side, and said to him:
sn35.125:1.3: “What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings aren’t fully extinguished in the present life?
sn35.125:1.4: What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings are fully extinguished in the present life?” …
sn35.125:1.5: (Tell in full as in the previous discourse.)
